Videos

Below are a selection of performances by Verity-Belle, showcasing her versatility and passion for music across various styles and settings. Whether you're planning a concert, private event, wedding, or corporate function, Verity-Belle’s captivating voice and professional stage presence can make your event truly memorable.

If you’re interested in booking Verity-Belle or learning more about her availability, please don’t hesitate to get in touch.

Enquire now

Ouvres tes yeux bleus

This song was recorded as the first in a series of recordings at Cowbridge Holy Cross Church in July 2024.

Accompanied by Amy Reynolds.

Vanilla Ice Cream

This recording is taken from a peformance at St Illtud's Church, Llantwit Major, where Verity-Belle was invited to perform alongside Cowbridge Coral Society as part of their Summer Concert in July 2023.

Accompanied by Carole Lloyd.

In uomini, in soldati

Taken from a series of recordings perfomed at the Royal Welsh College of Music & Drama while Verity was completing her Masters there as a vocal scholar in January 2020.

Accompanied by Caradog Williams.

More videos available on YouTube.
